text: Paulus Petrus Maria “Paul” Gilissen (28 August 1934 - 9 April 2020) was a Dutch KVP and later CDA politician. Gilissen was born in Amsterdam. He was mayor of Valkenburg-Houthem from 1976 to 1982 and Valkenburg aan de Geul from 1982 to 1990 and again in 1991. Gilissen died in Maastricht on 9 April 2020, aged 85. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Dutch mayors Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Politicians from Amsterdam
title: Paul Gilissen
